pages.text: $(li)Skeleton Villagers are the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villager$(/l) version of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can appear in $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raids$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) upon death.
